00026 #include <algorithm> // for max
00027 #include <iostream>
00028 #include "Array3.h"
00029 
00030 Array3::Array3( void ){
00031   data_ = new float();
00032   nx_ = 0;
00033   ny_ = 0;
00034   nz_ = 0;
00035   RealContainer_ = false;
00036 }
00037 
00038 Array3::Array3( float *dataptr, int nx, int ny, int nz ){
00039   cout << " in Array3 constructor with dataptr..." << endl;
00040   data_ = dataptr;
00041   nx_ = nx;
00042   ny_ = ny;
00043   nz_ = nz;
00044   RealContainer_ = true;
00045 }
00046 
00047 Array3::Array3( int nx, int ny, int nz ){
00048   std::cout << " in Array3 constructor..." << std::endl;
00049   nx_ = nx;
00050   ny_ = ny;
00051   nz_ = nz;
00052   data_ = new float[ nx_*ny_*nz_ ];
00053   RealContainer_ = true;
00054   for ( long long i = 0; i < nx_*ny_*nz_; ++i ){
00055     data_[ i ] = 0.0f;
00056   }
00057 }
00058 
00059 Array3::~Array3(){
00060   if ( RealContainer_ ){
00061     delete[] data_;
00062   }
00063 }
00064 
00065 Array3*
00066 Array3::operator=(Array3* a){
00067   nx_ = a->getNx();
00068   ny_ = a->getNy();
00069   nz_ = a->getNz();
00070   data_ = a->getData();
00071   RealContainer_ = a->getRealContainer();
00072   return this;
00073 }

00081 float
00082 Array3::getValue(int ix, int iy, int iz){
00083   return data_[(ix*ny_+iy)*nz_+iz];
00084 }
00085 
00086 void
00087 Array3::setValue(int ix, int iy, int iz, float val){
00088   long long i =  ( ix * ny_ + iy ) * nz_ + iz;
00089   data_[i] = val;
00090 }
00091 
00092 void
00093 Array3::addValue(int ix, int iy, int iz, float val){
00094   long long i =  ( ix * ny_ + iy ) * nz_ + iz;
00095   data_[i] += val;
00096 } 
00097 
00098 int
00099 Array3::get_size( void ) {
00100   return std::max( std::max( nx_, ny_ ), nz_ );
00101 }
00102 
00103 void 
00104 Array3::recreate( int nx, int ny, int nz ) {
00105   if ( RealContainer_ ){
00106     delete[] data_;
00107   } else {
00108     RealContainer_ = true;
00109     nx_ = nx;
00110     ny_ = ny;
00111     nz_ = nz;
00112     data_ = new float[ nx_ * ny_ * nz_ ];
00113     
00114     for ( long long i = 0; i < nx*ny*nz; ++i ){
00115       data_[ i ] = 0.0f;
00116     }
00117   }
00118 }
